name: Aiming Sense Lite - Pool/Snooker
description:
Aiming Sense - Pool/Snooker

Training your sense of aiming by playing!

★ Adjust cue ball to shot the target ball!
★ Option to show target ball angles!
★ Repeat missed shots (easiest way to improve!)
★ Many more settings to help you!
★ Game center supported!

There are 2 parts to become a true ‘potting machine’:
1. Mind: know exactly where to hit the object ball
2. Body: use your forearm and wrist to execute the plan

While you have to go to a pool/snooker table to train your body, you can train your mind to get a strong sense of aiming by using this app.

Pool/Snooker is a memory game. Aiming Sense enable you to improve your sense of cutting during your free time. No matter you have just a minute or a hour to spare, you can use it to improve or reinforce your sense of cutting to make your table time much more valuable!

Aiming Sense not only give you random angles of shots to practise, it also collects your results to generate statistics reports. Then you can use focused training (eg: 20-40°) to improve your weak angles.
